name: Arcana (itch) (eetuleppala)
description:
The sorcery-wielding woodland critters are being persecuted by the zealous, flat-faced cat prince Caspian and his domesticated minions. Win back your independence in this deck-building puzzler by outwitting your opponent and building a formidable group of freedom fighters.

The game is in its infancy and still very exploratory. Currently only the core loop has been implemented without any progression features. Please drop a comment and tell me about your play experience or what you would like to see in the game. Any feedback is welcome.
